Text: How Do We Make This Work? I D/L It that's as far as I got, I have PSP CUSTOM FIRMWARE, where do i put the files do i have do soemthing to them first, thanks...

what you are going to do is create a root folder called ISO in caps in the ISO file create a new file called VIDEO in caps. you will put the iso file in the ISO folder on the psp. /ISO/heatseaker.iso  remember to put a file in the ISO folder called VIDEO
